summary: REQ-1 appears to be addressed by neutering the PendingUpdateBanner component (it now renders null), which would prevent the software-update pop-up/banner from showing anywhere even if still referenced. However, the diff indicates additional unrelated modifications (not requested) including updates to project metadata/state files and potentially broader App behavior changes, which may violate the constraint to avoid any other UI/flow/backend behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state metadata (new feature request entries marked pending) unrelated to removing the update banner.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to remove the in-app software update pop-up/banner and explicitly constrains changes to that scope; project_state updates are not requested.
BuildRequest does not request changes to documentation or summary files; this is extra scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Potential additional App behavior/UI changes beyond removing the update banner (e.g., enhanced actor error handling, quiz tracking/navigation changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints explicitly say not to modify any other UI, copy, flows, or backend behavior beyond removing the software-update pop-up/banner; the diff summary text claims other functional changes in App and other areas.
